StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDistrictCMCRegValues]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @District int AS
SELECT CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.MONTH_CODE, CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, MISSION_VALUE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE ON CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.MONTH_CODE = MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE WHERE CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.MONTH_CODE > 0 AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' AND CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID = @District ORDER BY CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, MONTH_CODE.DISPLAY_ORDER
